targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  "Acre"
FROM brazil_states_diff
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

  "time" AS "time",
  "Algeria"
FROM "world_timeseries_AF_diff"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

list.name: state
list.tagValuesQuery: select name from static_brazil_states where region='$tag'

panels.title: Percentage hospital admissions of total number of cases

panels.content:
# Cases Explanation

"Cases" here follows the data from the RIVM. At 31-03-2020 the RIVM changed the data it publishes per city from "confirmed cases" to "cases in hospital" since this better represents the growth of the pandemic in the Netherlands.
This explains the drop seen at this date. Since RIVM doesnt provide data for hospital cases per city before this date I decided to merge this in one graph to show the spread of the pandemic.
panels.title: Explanation

panels.content: Make selection of cities by holding CTRL or SHIFT and left clicking on cities on the right (for now only on desktop)
panels.title: Help

panels.content:
# Cases in [[city]]

"Cases" here follows the data from the RIVM. At 31-03-2020 the RIVM changed the data it publishes per city from "confirmed cases" to "cases in hospital" since this better represents the growth of the pandemic in the Netherlands.
This explains the drop seen at this date. Since RIVM doesnt provide data for hospital cases per city before this date I decided to merge this in one graph to show the spread of the pandemic.
panels.title: Explanation

targets.rawSql: select time,"[[country]]" from "world_timeseries_AF" NATURAL JOIN "world_timeseries_AS" NATURAL JOIN "world_timeseries_EU" NATURAL JOIN "world_timeseries_NA" NATURAL JOIN "world_timeseries_OC" NATURAL JOIN "world_timeseries_SA" where type='confirmed'  ORDER BY time DESC limit 1

select time,"[[country]]" from "world_timeseries_AF" NATURAL JOIN "world_timeseries_AS" NATURAL JOIN "world_timeseries_EU" NATURAL JOIN "world_timeseries_NA" NATURAL JOIN "world_timeseries_OC" NATURAL JOIN "world_timeseries_SA" where type='deaths'  ORDER BY time DESC limit 1

select time,"[[country]]" from "world_timeseries_AF" NATURAL JOIN "world_timeseries_AS" NATURAL JOIN "world_timeseries_EU" NATURAL JOIN "world_timeseries_NA" NATURAL JOIN "world_timeseries_OC" NATURAL JOIN "world_timeseries_SA" where type='confirmed'

select time,"[[country]]" from "world_timeseries_AF" NATURAL JOIN "world_timeseries_AS" NATURAL JOIN "world_timeseries_EU" NATURAL JOIN "world_timeseries_NA" NATURAL JOIN "world_timeseries_OC" NATURAL JOIN "world_timeseries_SA" where type='deaths'

select time,"[[country]]" from "world_timeseries_AF_diff" NATURAL JOIN "world_timeseries_AS_diff" NATURAL JOIN "world_timeseries_EU_diff" NATURAL JOIN "world_timeseries_NA_diff" NATURAL JOIN "world_timeseries_OC_diff" NATURAL JOIN "world_timeseries_SA_diff" where type='confirmed'

select time,"[[country]]" from "world_timeseries_AF_diff" NATURAL JOIN "world_timeseries_AS_diff" NATURAL JOIN "world_timeseries_EU_diff" NATURAL JOIN "world_timeseries_NA_diff" NATURAL JOIN "world_timeseries_OC_diff" NATURAL JOIN "world_timeseries_SA_diff" where type='deaths'

select time,"[[country]]" from "world_timeseries_AF" NATURAL JOIN "world_timeseries_AS" NATURAL JOIN "world_timeseries_EU" NATURAL JOIN "world_timeseries_NA" NATURAL JOIN "world_timeseries_OC" NATURAL JOIN "world_timeseries_SA" where type='confirmed'

list.name: country

targets.rawSql: select NOW() AS "time", confirmed as "Total confirmed cases", admissions as "Total hospital admissions", deaths as "Total deaths" from netherlands_rivm_current limit 1
select NOW() AS "time", confirmed as "Added confirmed cases", admissions as "Added hospital admissions", deaths as "Added deaths" from netherlands_rivm_current order by index desc limit 1
select time, "Ziekenhuisopname_add" as "Total hospital admissions"  from netherlands_rivm_hospitals
select date as time, "intakeCumulative" as "Total IC admissions" from "corona-IC"

panels.title: Total Hospital, IC admissions and deaths

targets.rawSql: select time, "Ziekenhuisopname" as "Hospital admissions"  from netherlands_rivm_hospitals
select date as time, "newIntake" as "IC admissions" from "corona-IC"

panels.title: Daily reported Hospital, IC admissions and Deaths

targets.rawSql: select date as time, "intakeCount" as "active in IC" from "corona-IC"
select date as time, "newIntake" as "New Admissions" from "corona-IC"
select time, "Cases_add" as "Total cases", "Cases" as "New Cases"  from "netherlands_rivm_hospitals"
select NOW() AS "time", confirmed from china_stats where "type"='Overall'
select NOW() AS "time", deaths from china_stats where "type"='Overall'
select NOW() AS "time", type, confirmed from china_stats where "type"!='Overall' and "type"!='Male' and "type"!='Female'
select NOW() AS "time", type, confirmed from china_stats where "type"!='Overall' and "type"!='Male' and "type"!='Female'
select NOW() AS "time", type, confirmed from china_stats where "type"!='Overall' and "type"!='Male' and "type"!='Female'
select NOW() AS "time", type, deaths from china_stats where "type"!='Overall' and "type"!='Male' and "type"!='Female'
select NOW() AS "time", type, deaths from china_stats where "type"!='Overall' and "type"!='Male' and "type"!='Female'
select NOW() AS "time", type, deaths from china_stats where "type"!='Overall' and "type"!='Male' and "type"!='Female'

panels.content:
# Welcome to boerman.dev Grafana dashboard server

Here you can find various visualizations that I find personally interesting. If you have any questions feel free to shoot me an email at frank@fboerman.nl 

For more information about me and some of my projects you can visit my blog at [https://boerman.dev/](https://boerman.dev/)
panels.title: Welcome

panels.content:
# Dashboard overview

## Netherlands:
* [Current state, overal cases & deaths, hospital & IC situation](https://data.boerman.dev/d/wYiRAmjZz/coronavirus-covid-19-state-in-netherlands?orgId=1)
* per city [single](https://data.boerman.dev/d/vCk8JoXZk/coronavirus-covid-19-netherlands-cities-single?orgId=1), [all together](https://data.boerman.dev/d/-QdhSKuZz/coronavirus-covid-19-netherlands-cities-multiple?orgId=1)
* [hospital admissions](https://data.boerman.dev/d/4Puzj19Wz/coronavirus-covid-19-hospitals-statistics-rivm-latest?orgId=1)
* [spread](https://data.boerman.dev/d/xNbilX9Zz/coronavirus-covid-19-spread-map-netherlands?orgId=1)
* [age statistics](https://data.boerman.dev/d/QwCZX9uFv/coronavirus-covid-19-age-statistics-rivm-latest?orgId=1)
 
## World:
* [cases and deaths per country](https://data.boerman.dev/d/_WmAJNXZz/coronavirus-covid-19-per-country?orgId=1)
* [cases and deaths per continent](https://data.boerman.dev/d/wWiBrSuWz/coronavirus-covid-19-per-continent?orgId=1)

## Brazil:
* per state [all together](https://data.boerman.dev/d/i886RdrFf/coronavirus-covid-19-brazil-per-state-multiple?orgId=1), [individual](https://data.boerman.dev/d/i886RdrZz/coronavirus-covid-19-brazil-per-state?orgId=1)
* [spread map](https://data.boerman.dev/d/fqa7kRCWz/coronavirus-covid-19-spread-map-brazil?orgId=1)
panels.title: Overview
